mapper.select: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from post where category_no = #{_parameter}

choose.when: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from post where no = -1
choose.otherwise: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from post where no = #{_parameter}
